name: Ghosts and Bombs
description:
Ghosts and Bombs is a short roguelike where you throw bombs at ghosts and unlock doors with keys to get to the next procedurally generated floor of the dungeon!

Controls:
Arrow Keys  or WASD to move
Z or SPACE to throw a bomb

Touch a key to pick it up. Food heals you. Touch the exit stairs to go to the next level
Destroy the ghost portals quickly or more ghosts will appear!
Levels gradually get larger and more difficult
